languages.text: "Один. Один ксенос". {n}Хейнрикс с трудом сдерживается, чтобы не повысить голос.{/n} "Но таскать с собой обеих тварей у тебя нет никаких причин, кроме противоестественного желания поскорее отправиться на тот свет! Интересно, кто из этих двоих исполнит твою мечту раньше?"

"One. One xenos helper." {n}Heinrix is struggling not to raise his voice.{/n} "But you have no reason to be dragging both creatures around with you, aside from an unnatural desire to go to the afterlife sooner rather than later! I wonder which of these two will be the first to make your dream come true."
languages.original_text: "Один. Один ксенос". {n}Хейнрикс с трудом сдерживается, чтобы не повысить голос.{/n} "Но таскать с собой обеих тварей у тебя нет никаких причин, кроме противоестественного желания поскорее отправиться на тот свет! Интересно, кто из этих двоих исполнит твою мечту раньше?"

One xenos helper." {n}Heinrix is struggling not to raise his voice.{/n} "But you have no reason to be dragging both creatures around with you, aside from an unnatural desire to go to the afterlife sooner rather than later! I wonder which of these two will be the first to make your dream come true."

languages.text: 「ひとりだ。異種族の助っ人はひとりだけだぞ」{n}ハインリックスは必死に声を抑えている。{/n}「早くあの世に行きたいという不自然な願望はさておき、両方の生き物を一緒に連れまわす必要などないだろう！どちらが先にあなたの夢を実現させてくれるのか気になるところだな」
languages.original_text: "One. One xenos helper." {n}Heinrix is struggling not to raise his voice.{/n} "But you have no reason to be dragging both creatures around with you, aside from an unnatural desire to go to the afterlife sooner rather than later! I wonder which of these two will be the first to make your dream come true."

traits.locale_text: 「ひとりだ。異種族の助っ人はひとりだけだぞ」{n}ハインリックスは必死に声を抑えている。{/n}「早くあの世に行きたいという不自然な願望はさておき、両方の生き物を一緒に連れまわす必要などないだろう！どちらが先にあなたの夢を実現させてくれるのか気になるところだな」

languages.text: “一个帮手，一个就够了。”{n}海因里希努力克制着自己的怒火。{/n}“你没必要把这两个家伙都拖在身边。你这么做，我只能想到一个原因，那就是你活腻了，打算早点一命呜呼！我真想知道，这两个人究竟会是谁能让你梦想成真。”
languages.original_text: "One. One xenos helper." {n}Heinrix is struggling not to raise his voice.{/n} "But you have no reason to be dragging both creatures around with you, aside from an unnatural desire to go to the afterlife sooner rather than later! I wonder which of these two will be the first to make your dream come true."

traits.locale_text: “一个帮手，一个就够了。”{n}海因里希努力克制着自己的怒火。{/n}“你没必要把这两个家伙都拖在身边。你这么做，我只能想到一个原因，那就是你活腻了，打算早点一命呜呼！我真想知道，这两个人究竟会是谁能让你梦想成真。”

languages.text: «Uno. Un ayudante xenos». {n}Heinrix se esfuerza por no levantar la voz.{/n} «¡Pero no tiene ninguna razón para arrastrar a ambas criaturas consigo, excepto por su deseo demente de descubrir qué le espera después de la muerte! Me pregunto cuál de los dos será el primero en hacer realidad su sueño».
languages.original_text: "One. One xenos helper." {n}Heinrix is struggling not to raise his voice.{/n} "But you have no reason to be dragging both creatures around with you, aside from an unnatural desire to go to the afterlife sooner rather than later! I wonder which of these two will be the first to make your dream come true."

traits.locale_text: «Uno. Un ayudante xenos». {n}Heinrix se esfuerza por no levantar la voz.{/n} «¡Pero no tiene ninguna razón para arrastrar a ambas criaturas consigo, excepto por su deseo demente de descubrir qué le espera después de la muerte! Me pregunto cuál de los dos será el primero en hacer realidad su sueño».

languages.text: "Einen. Einen Xenos-Helfer." {n}Heinrix müht sich, seine Stimme nicht zu erheben.{/n} "Aber Ihr habt keinen Grund, beide Kreaturen mit Euch herumzuschleppen, abgesehen von dem unnatürlichen Verlangen, lieber früher als später ins Jenseits zu gelangen! Ich frage mich, welcher der beiden Euch diesen Traum zuerst erfüllen wird."
languages.original_text: "One. One xenos helper." {n}Heinrix is struggling not to raise his voice.{/n} "But you have no reason to be dragging both creatures around with you, aside from an unnatural desire to go to the afterlife sooner rather than later! I wonder which of these two will be the first to make your dream come true."

traits.locale_text: "Einen. Einen Xenos-Helfer." {n}Heinrix müht sich, seine Stimme nicht zu erheben.{/n} "Aber Ihr habt keinen Grund, beide Kreaturen mit Euch herumzuschleppen, abgesehen von dem unnatürlichen Verlangen, lieber früher als später ins Jenseits zu gelangen! Ich frage mich, welcher der beiden Euch diesen Traum zuerst erfüllen wird."

languages.text: « Un. Nous avons besoin de l'aide d'un seul xénos, {n}grogne Heinrix en faisant un effort visible pour ne pas hausser le ton.{/n} Vous n'avez donc aucune raison de trimballer ces deux créatures avec vous, à moins que vous n'espériez rejoindre l'au-delà avant l'heure ! Je me demande lequel des deux exaucera votre souhait en premier... »
languages.original_text: "One. One xenos helper." {n}Heinrix is struggling not to raise his voice.{/n} "But you have no reason to be dragging both creatures around with you, aside from an unnatural desire to go to the afterlife sooner rather than later! I wonder which of these two will be the first to make your dream come true."

traits.locale_text: « Un. Nous avons besoin de l'aide d'un seul xénos, {n}grogne Heinrix en faisant un effort visible pour ne pas hausser le ton.{/n} Vous n'avez donc aucune raison de trimballer ces deux créatures avec vous, à moins que vous n'espériez rejoindre l'au-delà avant l'heure ! Je me demande lequel des deux exaucera votre souhait en premier... »

languages.text: "Bir tane. Yardımcı olacak bir tane zeno." {n}Heinrix, sesini yükseltmemek için kendini zor tutuyor.{/n} "Ancak bu iki yaratığı birden peşinde sürüklemek için hiçbir sebebin yok, tabii eğer bir an önce canından olmanın hayalini kurmuyorsan! Acaba önce hangisi seni hayaline kavuşturacak?"
languages.original_text: "One. One xenos helper." {n}Heinrix is struggling not to raise his voice.{/n} "But you have no reason to be dragging both creatures around with you, aside from an unnatural desire to go to the afterlife sooner rather than later! I wonder which of these two will be the first to make your dream come true."
